translations: adj．光谱光度法的：与光谱光度法有关的，光谱光度法是一种测量物质吸收或发射光谱的技术。
· The spectrophotometrical analysis of the sample showed the presence of various elements.
样品的光谱光度法分析显示出了各种元素的存在。

sentences.sentence: The activity of GST, NQO and cellular reduced glutathione(GSH) content were measured by spectrophotometrical methods.
sentences.translation: 用光谱法检测细胞GST酶和NQO酶的活性，以及还原型谷胱甘肽（GSH）的含量；
